gui.familiar_friends.author: Author(s):
entity.familiar_friends.chicken_companio: Grants the Player passive slow falling while the player is on the ground, which lasts for 2 seconds when in the air.
entity.familiar_friends.iron_golem_compa: Damages attackers or hostile mobs while also sending them flying into the air (causing additional fall damage).
entity.familiar_friends.ocelot_companion: Grants the player passive Swiftness. You can also press "%s" to Meow.
entity.familiar_friends.navi_companion.d: When the Player approaches a vein of Ancient Debris or Diamond Ore, Navi will alert the player. They will increase their pitch the closer the player gets to the vein.
entity.familiar_friends.one_up_mushroom_: Saves the Player from death. If the 1-Up Mushroom is used it will need to be unlocked again!
entity.familiar_friends.companion_cube_c: Grants the Player the ability to walk on lava (albeit, for a short period). This Companion is your best friend!
Will Smite the direction you look when pressing "%s"! There is a 15 second cooldown before lightning can be struck again.
entity.familiar_friends.chuck_norris_com: Perform a Round-House-Kick that sends foes flying with "%s"! There is a 25 second cooldown before Chuck Norris will perform another Round-House-Kick
